thread.title: BREAKING NEWS: Ghana name four debutants for Canada friendly Ofosu-Ayeh, Baah in squad
thread.title_full: BREAKING NEWS: Ghana name four debutants for Canada friendly Ofosu-Ayeh, Baah in squad

title: BREAKING NEWS: Ghana name four debutants for Canada friendly Ofosu-Ayeh, Baah in squad
text:
23:25 CET BREAKING NEWS: Ghana name four debutants for Canada friendly – Ofosu-Ayeh, Baah in squad - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana coach Avram Grant has named Phil Ofosu-Ayeh and Gideon Baah among four debutants in his 18-man squad for Tuesday’s international friendly against Canada in Washington, the Ghana FA has confirmed its roster for the game. 
USA-based midfielder duo of Llyod Sam and Kwadwo Poku also get their first international call-ups after excelling in the American top-flight this season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
